com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Class ConstrainedPositionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.ConstrainedDragHandler<IPositionHandler>
      • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.ConstrainedPositionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDragHandler, IPositionHandler

    public abstract class ConstrainedPositionHandler
extends ConstrainedDragHandler<IPositionHandler>
implements IPositionHandler
    A convenience implementation of the IPositionHandler interface that can be used to constrain the position of an item.
    See Also:
    ConstrainedDragHandler, ConstrainedDragHandler.constrainNewLocation(IInputModeContext, com.yworks.yfiles.geometry.PointD, com.yworks.yfiles.geometry.PointD)

      Initializes a new instance of the ConstrainedPositionHandler class that delegates to the wrappedHandler.
